Function Documentation

void Delay ( u32  nTime)

Inserts a delay time.

Parameters:
nTime,:specifies the delay time length, in milliseconds.
Return values:
None
void EVWUP_IRQHandler ( void  )

This function handles EXTI Events Wakeup interrupt.

Return values:
None

The EXTI Event Wakeup interrupt handler as following:

  • If the WAKEUP pin wakeup event occurred : Toggle LED2.
  • If the RTC compare match event occurred : Toggle LED3.
    Note:
    The RTC_SR and PWRCU_BAKSR is clear by read action.

Definition at line 127 of file example/PWRCU/DeepSleepMode2/ht32f5xxxx_01_it.c.

Definition at line 62 of file example/PWRCU/DeepSleepMode2/ht32f5xxxx_01_it.c.

int main ( void  )

Main program.

Return values:
None
Note:
At this stage the microcontroller clock setting is already configured, this is done through SystemInit() function which is called from startup file (startup_ht32fxxxx.s) before branching to application main. To reconfigure the default setting of SystemInit() function, refer to system_ht32fxxxx.c file

The main program as following:

  • Initialize LEDs.
  • Configure RTC clock source and prescaler.
  • Configure WAKEUP pin used to wakeup Deep Sleep Mode 2.
  • Enable and set EXTI Event Wakeup interrupt to the lowest priority.
  • Configure the SysTick to generate an interrupt per millisecond.
  • Turn on LED1.
  • Wait for pressing KEY1 to enter the infinite loop.
  • In the infinite loop:
    • Insert 0.5 second delay.
    • Wait till RTC count occurs.
    • Compare Match in 3 second.
    • Turn off LED1.
    • Request to enter Deep Sleep mode 2 (The LDO is disable and DMOS is ON).
    • Turn on LED1 when the system has resumed from Deep Sleep mode 2.

Definition at line 106 of file example/PWRCU/DeepSleepMode2/ht32f5xxxx_01_it.c.

void RTC_Configuration ( void  )

Configures RTC clock source and prescaler.

Return values:
None

The RTC configuration as following:

  • Check the backup domain(RTC & PWRCU) is ready for access.
  • Reset Backup Domain.
  • Enable the LSE OSC and wait till LSE is ready.
  • Select the RTC Clock Source as LSE.
  • Set the RTC time base to 1 second.
  • Set Compare value.
  • Enable the RTC.
  • Enable the RTC Compare Match wakeup event.
